title: Itazurakko no Seifukuron
original_name: いたずらっこの征服論
sinopse:
Michiya Ayase is a playboy who always has a new girl on hand, but the one whose attention he craves the most is unexpectedly his best friend, Kouta Satori. Trying to stay cool about it, he sets up Kouta with a girl, but things don’t go as expected...

(Source: Exiled Rebels Scans)
